inn1.comm: slowly tossed up through the air, bit of turn on off stump, defended
the one that goes straight on, he waits on it and plays it out on the off side
Watson is away, this one turns in to leg stump, and he whips it away to deep square leg
sharp, sharp turn, from outside off stump and down the legside
this one does not turn, bounces and goes straight on, he blocks
chips this one in the air, there was deep midwicket on the boundary, but it was not timed well at all, fell way short of that man
now he goes much wide of off stump, and turns it in, he brings front foot out and pushes it out to point
on a length and across the batsman, doesn't bounce much outside off and is played away towards extra cover
pushes at one angled even wider across him, and gets a thick edge past slips down to third man
gets him to drive off the front foot with a length ball outside off, goes straight to extra cover
Watson with that late dab that gets him so many runs down to third man, but Dhoni has a gully in place, and he takes it on the bounce
134.1 kph, just short of a length, and takes off a bit more than Watson expected, he had a push at it outside off, and was beaten
comes forward, staying slightly beside the line of one going across him, and pushes out to point
turns in sharply from outside off, calmly patted back off the back foot
uses the turn to work this one away to deep square leg
tight line, played out to short midwicket
the one that goes straight on, pitches around leg and is carefully played back to the bowler
pushed off the front foot to mid on
Watson has seen enough to launch in to the slog sweep, lunging forward, gets close to the ball, and swats it wide of Harbhajan at deep midwicket
Haddin with that back-outside-leg-and-target-extra-cover shot, but mistimes it to mid off
136.8 kph darts in with the angle from back of a length, he is some way outside leg stump, and takes it high on the pad

for the third time in succession, Haddin gets outside leg stump, and this time connects with the shot, but Kohli at short extra cover grabs the ball, and fires in the throw at Watson's end, who had to put in the dive quickly
gets outside the line of this one angled in, and whips it away to Sachin at fine leg
comes forward and middles the ball with a loud crack, it races away to extra cover
123.6 kph slower one cutting in, but the line was on leg stump, and Watson picked it neatly in front of square leg, again a boundary off the last ball of the over
turns in from outside off stump, a bit short, but he stays in the crease and pushes it to mid on
a touch quicker, and he shuffles to work it to short midwicket
beats him in the flight, Haddin is lured into going over the infield with the turn, gets an inside edge that loops in the air, but there is no one at square leg
defended off the front foot, inside edge rolls away on the leg side
he is keeping it really tight here, another one around leg stump is played out towards mid on

and for the third time in as many overs, Watson gets a boundary off the last ball, with tremendous bat speed, hits a full delivery back towards Ashwin, who fails to field it and the outfield is too quick after that happens
comes in with the angle from round the stumps, he brings down his bat at an angle as well. and gets an inside edge on the leg side
the Watson forward defence, bat and pad tightly close together, comes forward solidly and blocks off the middle of the bat
and again he defends off the front foot, but with a slightly open face to play out the length ball towards point
back of a length this time, and he stays in the crease to push it towards mid off

slightly over pitched, and at that angle from round the stumps, it is enough for Watson, lets it comes on and whips it in to the gap past short midwicket and mid on, lovely timing, no movement whatsoever for the bowler
no boundary off the last ball this time, Watson is done for the over, shuts up shop with a perfect forward defensive around off stump
uses the turn to work it away behind square leg, Zaheer comes in from fine leg and keeps them to one
pinches a tight single to mid on which is a bit deep
almost yorker length on leg stump, he jams down his bat on it

puff of dust as this one turns in sharply from outside off, Haddin had it covered, took the front leg forward and chipped it in the air, it was timed so well that it carried over the wide long on ropes
the carrom ball, but too short to trouble him, goes back to push it on the off side
driven back to Ashwin who fields it cleanly this time
no movement or anything for the fast bowler, Watson plonks front foot forward and bashes this length ball to mid on
well, is it possible to use the angle from round the stumps any better, gets front leg across and sweeps this one past Sachin who is in the circle at fine leg
thumped off the front foot this time, this looks like a good toss to win, mid off fields
slightly back of a length around middle and leg, played out calmly towards mid on
works a length ball with the angle to midwicket, Watson is looking in no trouble at all
they take on Harbhajan at mid off, it was firmly pushed off the front foot, and they went for the run, direct hit would have had Haddin in some bother, Harbhajan has hands on his wide white hat
quicker through the air than Ashwin, he gets forward to defend a fuller one
now he goes back to one that was not short enough, it turns in sharply, but he manages to play it away towards leg slip
91.6 kph, played with the turn to short midwicket from outside off
tosses it up outside off stump, he waits a while before smothering it in forward defence
makes him go for the big sweep from outside off stump, but there is the man at square leg
and after having created some pressure, Harbhajan bowls a fast full toss on the pads, Watson happily puts it away wide of deep midwicket, where Raina does well to dive and cut off the boundary
makes him block this one hurriedly as it turns in from outside off stump
now draws him forward, he pats a fuller one back to the bowler
tossed up slowly, inviting the drive against the turn, not a good idea on this wicket, he goes for it, and gets it down to mid off, but manages to pinch the single
played back to the bowler off the front foot
lazy from Ashwin, is late in parrying a ball played back to him, to short midwicket and almost concedes a run

the man from Chennai has struck, Watson went for the slog sweep, this one was slower through the air, tossed up, and turned in to strike the off stump, even as Watson missed it completely, did not get too far across to pick it from outside off, played a bit early too
goes across and picks a fuller one from way outside off to midwicket
a bit shorter, turns in and he goes back to push it back to the bowler
85.6 kph, a touch slower, he waits on it and turns it towards square leg
fires this one in full and on leg stump, easily worked away through square leg
lunges way forward to one that is flighted outside off stump, pushed out to extra cover
the Australia captain in two minds, decides to do neither, stays on the crease and pushes at one that turns in sharply to strike him on the pad but way outside off stump
does not turn in as much, a bit short, and he goes back to cut it to point
much fuller now, around leg stump, played out towards short midwicket
very full and on leg stump, whipped in the air down to fine leg
comes well forward and pushes this one away past cover
Munaf lumbers after one that is pushed through covers, and that means a couple is easily taken
possible chance, gets him to chip it in the air, he is beaten in the flight, but manages to get it just over Zaheer running to his left from mid off, and what's more, it also runs in to the boundary
shufles across and goes well back to push a turning delivery, gets a leading edge towards the bowler
plays out this one towards short leg
another edge, Ponting is pinned on the crease, pushes at one that bounces, and the thick edge goes towards point
there is no leg slip, and Ponting flicks a fuller delivery in that region, Zaheer tidies up at fine leg
tossed up generously outside off stump, he drives with the turn to long on
flatter and fuller this time, and it is patted back to the bowler
starts off with a widish length ball outside off, punched to sweeper cover
134.7 kph, length ball with some width outside off, Haddin makes some more room outside leg, and goes inside-out past extra cover, he has been looking to do that against the seamers

Munaf had taken out Pietersen against England with a screamer of a catch, Haddin offers him another chances at glory, with a furious shot straight back at him, but Munaf is late to get his hands on it, and Haddin as two boundaries in two balls
plays this one outside off quietly towards point
follows him outside leg stump even as he backs away, but is cramped for room
Munaf has leaked a lot of boundaries in his opening over, here's another one, length ball sitting up, and Haddin clears front leg and smokes it over mid on
turns in from outside off, but short enough for him to shuffle and whip it backward of square
much fuller this time, he drives with the turn down to long on
another full delivery around off, he adjusts to ease it to long on off the front foot
gets him to drive to a tossed up delivery outside off stump, he gets it off the inner half of the bat and collects a single towards long on, Harbhajan cannot stop the ball, finds Ricky in the way
tossed up full on middle, played out towards midwicket
flighted again, and turning, but from round the stumps, goes down leg
this one went straight on at an angle outside off, made him uncertainly reach out and push it towards point
tossed up slowly, and very full, dug out to Yuvraj;s left, and he does well to cut off the single
another fuller one, this time on leg stump, and eased towards deep midwicket
83.2 kph, a touch flatter, he lunges out and pushes it away to point

drives with the turn to short extra cover, where Raina covers a lot of ground to his right, gets up and fires in the direct hit to the striker's end, Ponting is well in, and that's what the replays confirm
waits for a flighted one to arrive on middle and leg, and pushes it down the ground towards long on
more flight from Yuvraj, he gets forward and pushes with the turn towards short extra cover
Ponting gets in to a considerable tangle, looks to cut a delivery that is neither short nor wide, and in the end plays it out towards point
goes deep in the crease, and whips a turning ball through square leg, the fielder messes up initially but keeps them to one in the end
fired in flatter and quicker on middle stump, patted back to the bowler
flighted one now, played out with the turn on the leg side
slightly short and turning in, punched off the back foot and sweeper cover gets around to field
tossed up from round the stumps, turns down the leg side, Ponting went feeling for it, wanting to nudge it fine
better line, makes him go right back in the crease and he turns it away to deep midwicket
Raina runs to his right and cuts off the drive from Ponting
Ponting gets his first boundary, skips down the track, gets outside the line, and lofts against the turn wide of midwicket, lovely shot
gets the outside edge as Ponting pushes hard at one, it rushes past slip
Ponting is taking on the part-timer here, goes down on the knee and slog sweeps a flatter one to the deep midwicket boundary
and now goes right forward, and smothers a turning delivery
pushes out this one towards covers, he is done for the over
turns in from outside off, Haddin tucks with the spin to midwicket
offie on middle from round the wicket, Ponting stays back and defends as it straightens.
this one is too straight, and Ponting works it through midwicket for a single
length ball with some air from over the wicket to Haddin, defended back to the bowler
drifts in from a little wide of the crease, Haddin is happy to defend from the crease to the leg side
fuller on middle, Haddin eases it down to long on for a single
legcutter at 116 kph, good delivery pretty full and Haddin defends from the crease. Good move from Dhoni to come up.
smart batting from Haddin. 130 kph, short ball wide enough outside off for Haddin to safely guide down to third man, past Dhoni who can't do much. Expertly executed late cut that.
another legcutter, this time Haddin gets the outside edge as he looks to steer to the off side.
back of a length, again a touch of away nip and Ponting defends with the full face

slower ball, 119 kph and everything happens in slow motion. Ponting lunges out early and has to pull back as he looks to defend down the track. Munaf falls down to his right with the grace of a tall tree that's being felled, and stops the ball.
fuller and wider outside off, Ponting leans out to drive into the covers for a single
turn from outside off, Ponting leans out and defends
inviting dolly tossed up outside off, very wide and Ponting lets it go. Hmm.
poor delivery, dropped really short and Ponting pumps the cut well in front of square. Desperation from Harbhajan running across from deep point and he manages to stop the boundary.
full and flat outside off, played straight to cover
loopy delivery, dips on Haddin who drives on the half volley into the covers for a single
another rank-bad short delivery outside off, too wide for Ponting to cut and he again slaps into the covers with the kind of ugliness the ball deserves to be dealt with.
full delivery on off stump, Ponting drives easily to long off. Dhoni comes back up to the stumps.
legcutter, nifty delivery and Haddin has to adjust and defend as it nips away from a length
another one, slightly shorter this time and Haddin punches to the leg side

Haddin has 50. Munaf is clocked at 138 kph. I wonder if that's a speed gun glitch. Over-pitched on the leg stump, Haddin gets the front foot inside the line and heaves away over the vacant midwicket area. Not the best bit of timing, but perfect choice of placement. Well played.
another legcutter on leg stump, good ball but comes after a poor delivery. Haddin defends this one but Munaf is leaking runs.
ends with a back of a length ball on the middle and leg, Haddin whips to midwicket, but they can't get the single
too short from Yuvraj again, easy pickings for Ponting who steers the cut to deep point
holds it back and gets some grip outside off, Haddin waits and punches into the covers
that's the fourth successive short ball from Yuvraj to Ponting. Another cut for a single to deep point
mis-hit by Haddin and just as well. He was looking to carve up Yuvraj's tossed up delivery inside out, and ended up spooning it just over the infield

Yuvraj's golden arm strikes again. Raina takes a smart low catch tumbling forward. Haddin was clearly looking to make things happen against Munaf and Yuvraj, and he may have chanced his arm once too often. Yuvraj slows this one up in the air, tosses it up on off and gets it to break away. Haddin looks to power the cover drive with the spin, but once again goes in the air. It is dying on Raina, but he's alert enough to tumble forward and pouch it.
and he prances out of the crease first ball. Yuvraj sees him and holds the length back. Clarke has to adjust and get across to cover the line. Defended to the off side.
legcutter straightens on off stump, Ponting pushes into the covers
slight change of pace, 120 kph full and looking for the lbw. Ponting seemed to come down on it a little late, but managed to defend to the leg side
too straight, comes in with the angle, Ponting cheekily taps through square leg and runs like the wind for a couple
another couple. Slow, back of a length ball outside off, Ponting opens the face as he steers through backward point. Enough time for two before Zaheer can get there and get a languid throw in.
slower ball on off stump, Ponting lunges forward in customary fashion and plays it out to mid off
ends with a smart legcutter on middle and off, Ponting carefully covers the line and defends
short of a length on off stump, Clarke gets off the mark easily since long on is back. He punches to the deep and sets off
Raina is electric as always in the covers. Yuvraj flights one outside off and Ponting drives powerfully. A horizontal Raina intercepts
shortens the length. On off stump and going away, Ponting smothers the spin and eases it to spin.
middles the defensive push this time. Gets it out to point
Ponting drives past Raina this time and eventually gets the single. That moment of brilliance from Raina was worth three dot balls. That's what good fielding does for the team.
another dot ball to end the over, Clarke can't get the cut past point.
back of a length on the pads, Ponting defends to the leg side. Dhoni's menacing presence near the stumps makes things difficult for the batsmen.
width outside off, Ponting slams the square drive behind point for a single. Munaf has protection in the deep.
Clarke nudges off the pads, gets past short midwicket, but not mid on.
length ball outside off, Clarke controls the push into the covers for a single
holds the length back outside off, Ponting camps on the back foot and punches through the covers for a single

slips the last ball on the pads, but the length is disciplined enough to ensure Clarke can't get freebies. Nudged to square leg for a single. Dhoni is indeed getting some quiet overs out of Munaf at the moment.
angling in from wide of the crease, Clarke defends off the front foot as it straightens
Clarke skips out, works with the angle to an alert Kohli at midwicket.
Clarke again skips out, this time conscious to get the on drive straighter. Single to long on.

well bowled and well fielded by Yuvraj. He gets one to drift in nicely and Ponting comes forward to drive past him. Yuvraj moves to his left quickly, dives and fields. Might have jammed a finger into the ground in the process. He is in some strife.
Ponting squeezes a single, with the spin past cover point for one
arm ball, Clarke did not pick it as he went back for the punch to the off side and ended up heaving to Kohli at mid on, who cuts off any hopes of a single. Occasional sparks on the field from India.
top timing from Ponting. Short of a length outside off, Ponting lunges into an accomplished cover drive and gets a couple

loud appeal from Munaf, none from Dhoni. Will this be referred? Ian Chappell says he needs to be a damn good salesman to convince Dhoni to review this, and Dhoni has bought it. India have reviewed it. And that's a wasted review. Short of a length ball, lands on middle, holds its line, but its hit Ponting too high as he played back and looked to flick. Was missing the top of leg stump by a few inches.

vintage Ponting. Legcutter at 121 kph, Ponting seemed to read it even before Munaf sent it down. He seemed to have read it from Munaf's brain. He got into position to the length ball, moving that front foot into a lovely position and just launched it through the line, almost all the way over long on. Super shot.
shortens the length this time, Ponting plays back and defends carefully.
again Munaf holds the length back and Ponting plays from the crease defensively.
drives a full length ball on the pads to long on for a single, Munaf's few quiet overs may be out of the way. Dhoni might be mulling a bowling change here. Raina, may be?
tossed up on middle and leg and straightening, Ponting has jumped out of the crease, looking to flick and gets a leading edge to point
too short, Ponting rocks back in a flash and plays to deep point for a single
Clarke's missed out on a long hop, carving a short ball straight to Kohli at cover
sliding along with the angle, Clarke gets something on it down towards fine leg
slow and loopy outside off, Clarke skips out, gets the front foot across to the pitch and pushes to the off side
drifts into the pads to end the over, Clarke picks him with the angle through wide mid on for a single
leggie to start off outside leg as the batsman hops out and works it to long on for one
hideously poor full toss on middle and off, Ponting could have hit that back to Tasmania if he wanted, but he's pulled it straight to midwicket

whoa! He's bowled the ball of the day! Drifts in towards outside leg stump, lands, grips and breaks right past the face of the bat. Clarke looks flummoxed. Hasn't seen such spin since he faced Warne in the nets.
full toss. What a mixed bag. Clarke bunts to long on for one.
another ripping leggie on leg stump, Ponting carefully defends as it breaks in.
he's tried to bowl a fellow legend round the legs. Ponting knows it well and does well to get bat on a paddle sweep to fine leg. Entertaining over, that!
Yuvraj loops one on middle and leg, Clarke drives to long on for a single
too short, another poor ball wasted as Ponting cuts to cover
Raina in the way again. Full on off stump, Ponting drives into the covers and it's that man, horizontal Raina, flying into the path and deflecting it away. Single, all the same.

uhoh, Clarke has played the worst shot of the day. India's best spinner in this World Cup has taken another wicket. Flighted ball on leg stump, Clarke looks to play an ugly slog-swipe, across the line and completely out of character, against the spin, and indeed the run of play. He got the front foot across, was inside the line and then top-edged the shot since it was very full. He was probably looking for the gap between long on and midwicket. Zaheer takes it in the outfield at midwicket. Nicely judged running take.
tossed up on off stump, Ponting defends to the off side
Ponting has 50. He's played within himself and found some form. Another inviting flighted ball on the stumps, Ponting eases it with the spin to deep cover for one more.
starts off round the wicket, full and angling in in search of reverse. Ponting lunges forward to play into the covers
Mike is away. Slow yorker at 118 kph outside off and Mike pushes it away into the covers, and in a muddle of fast-moving of feet gets across to the other end.
slides down into Ponting's pads and he glances backward of square for a single
smart ball, back of a length and no room outside off, Mike looks to drop to the off side and gets a single, but Dhoni has an extra fielder in the circle to cut the single off
the first hint of reverse. Zaheer gets one to tail in at 138 kph, and Mike inside-edges the on-drive to midwicket.
another slower ball, 120 kph, and Ponting clearly did not pick it. He was sucked into an early on-drive, and it looped away to land at the vacant mid on area.
flat offie breaks in from outside off, Ponting works it from the crease wide of mid on for a single
back of a length outside off, Mike works it with the spin to point
needs to flight the ball more. Mike plays back and whips easily against the spin to midwicket for one
nice bowling, curls in from wide of the crease and breaks in sharply from outside off, but Ponting has the line covered as he nudges backward of square leg. Sehwag tumbles and saves.
finally he brings Mike forward and gets him to push it with the spin to the covers

lovely ball. Harbhajan draws Mike out of the crease with loop and sharp spin. Mike is a master, though he's beaten and his back foot came out as he looked to defend, he was alert to push it back into the crease before Dhoni could effect a stumping.
fullish ball outside off, angled in from wide of the crease, Ponting walks into the cover drive and gets a single
nice nip from Zaheer, gets one to go away from Mike. He fishes for it from the crease, neither forward nor back, and nearly feathers it.

Zaheer does it again. It's again that mystery bare-knuckle slower ball. It's the latest invention from the Zaheer labs. Instead of getting fore-finger and middle-finger behind the seam, he gets the middle finger alone behind the ball and pushes it through with the knuckle of the fore-finger, which is to the right of the ball. Hence, there is a subtle change in pace, that the batsman can't read out of the hand unless he has binoculars. Hussey doesn't. The knuckle ends up pushing the ball in and also helps it move in after landing on the turf. Devon Smith got it the other day, and played all over it. Exactly how Mr. Cricket just did. 118 kph, flummoxes the batsman all ends up and castles him as he heaves the flick and misses. Zaheer spreads his arms on either side, breaks into a smile and trots along as his team-mates converge. Motera loves it.
punched off the back foot into covers
bangs this one in from round the stumps, he goes back to defend
goes too full and down the leg side now, is flicked away to fine leg
turning in, not short enough, but Ponting swivels and pulls it through square leg
White goes for the cute paddle to a ball tossed up outside off stump, gets it in the air, almost carried to the diving man at short leg
played out on the leg side off the front foot

Harbhajan is not happy, Ponting went for the sweep to a flat and fast one, got it off the middle of the blade in front of square leg, but Yuvraj on the boundary barely moved to his left, even if he had, he didn't have any chance, it was struck so well, but the lack of any attempt riled Harbhajan
played off the front foot on the leg side
shuffles across and outside off stump, and punches it on the leg side
wobbles a bit in the air, goes full outside off stump, and is driven off the front foot to long off
driven down the ground this time to long on
eased in to the gap through covers and wide of sweeper cover. who does well to dive to his right and save some runs
pushed out on the off side off the front foot
lunges forward to defend on the off side
spirits down the track, takes this one on the half volley, and eases it down to long off
tossed up outside off stump, he gets it off the inner half to Yuvraj
goes forward and pushes this one to silly point
goes for the paddle again, doesn't come off cleanly, gets it towards square leg
comes down the track, gets to the pitch and creams the drive, but cannot get it past extra cover
White is all at sea, tries the sweep from miles outside off, this one does not turn much, and he is beaten
pushed down the track to Ashwin who is some discomfort but fields it cleanly in the end

umpire Erasmus was unmoved even as the entire stadium went up in appeal for the catch, White went for the sweep,seemed to get it off the glove for the ball to loop in the air to Dhoni on the leg side, India went for the review, and it shows that the ball came off the forearm
pushed in to the leg side for a single this time
played down the ground for a single
driven to long on now, singles available all around
stretches forward to push at a widish delivery, silly point does well to stop it
he continues to struggle with the sweep, gets it off the pads, on the bounce to slip
looks to launch this one out of the ground, comes down the track, but in the form he is in, he is lucky to get it along the ground to long on
Ricky Ponting shows how it is done, skips to the pitch of the ball, and lofts it with the turn over extra cover, all the way
some bounce for Yuvraj now from outside off, he manages to keep it down

Yuvraj ends his spell with a boundary, this is deja vu for India, Ponting is looking ominous now, goes back to a bouncing delivery, and cut hard, enough on the thick edge to beat short third man easily
opens him up a tad with a one that straightens off a length on the stumps, off a thick edge towards point
takes a step towards the ball and shows the full face to pick a single to long on
Ponting swivels and dispatches a marginally short ball, on the leg stump, gets it backward of square leg
cramps him now with a length ball just around off stump, jabbed away off the back foot
tucks him up with a back of a length ball again around off stump, has him pushing out off the back foot
133.1 kph, almost yorker length, dug out towards extra cover
tosses the leg break up around middle and off, it is pushed with the turn to extra cover
touch short, and on leg stump, whipped away easily through square leg
the Sachin long hop arrives, full toss outside off stump, Ponting lifted it over extra cover, it is pulled back near the ropes
strikes him on the pads, they go up in appeal, pitched outside leg
in the blockhole, super delivery, dug out to the bowler
turned towards Munaf at fine leg who saunters in, but they don't take the second
120.4 kph fuller one on leg stump, eased down to long on

and the man has struck again, 127.6 kph length delivery that seemed to stop on him from round the stumps, he had a feeble push at it for Zaheer to take the dolly as it looped back to him, he throws it in the air and takes off on a run, White's horror run continues
and is opened up first ball with a delivery that straightens around off stump, he had no clue about it, and pushed at it, only to get beaten
118.3 kph, slower one all gone wrong, full and down the leg side, David got across and helped it on its way past short fine leg
the one that cuts away from a length, he is again squared up, but this time manages to get it down to third man
gets well forward to push to Raina at extra cover, David comes rushing for the single, Ponting sends him back
shortish and turning in, whipped to midwicket
digs out a very fuller one in the air, but way to the right of Ashwin
straighter one, but a touch short, he goes back and turns it wide of midwicket
short and turning in, he backs away and cuts, but straight to Zaheer, who helps by letting the ball burst through his hands
collects another single on the off side off another shortish one
turned to Raina at midwicket who dives and saves the single, how many times does he do that?
Ponting walks in to a very full delivery, takes it on the pads, Zaheer goes for the appeal, but he is not getting that one, India have no reviews, he was well down the track too
another full delivery, pins him in the crease, Ponting can't do anything with it other than dig it out
goes for yet another full one, gets it a bit outside off this time, and that allows him to ease it down to long off
lovely placement by David, makes room to a short and wide one, cuts it through point, and sweeper cover had no chance, poor line and David punished it
whoops, gets it full and down the leg side, David happily puts it past short fine leg
gets an inside edge towards square leg as he looks to force one away, Australia have got what they wanted in this over
gets across and shuffles to work this one away through square leg
Ponting is oozing with confidence now, stands two feet outside leg to someone who has got him on numerous occasions, he tosses it up, and Ponting launches it through wide of long off
good response from the bowler, fires one in on the stumps, Ponting looks to whip it away, misses, that was taking out the stumps, the umpire thought it wasnt. India have no reviews left
turns down the leg side, Ponting misses on the shot
whips one wide of long on, and David comes back for the second, good running
sweeps this one backward of square leg
turning down the leg side, pulled away to deep square leg
low full toss on the leg stump, he was not expecting it, adjusted to get a single down to long on
full again on the leg stump,this is the Ponting on old, flicks it elegantly off the pads through midwicket
almost in the blockhole, Zaheer on target in this over, dug away to long on
another low full toss on the leg stump, Ponting eases it through midwicket, that would have run in to the boundary, had Kohli not got a hand to it, running to his right
Zaheer has been full and on leg this over, once more, this time he misses out, flicking straight to square leg
one more low full toss to end with, pushed back down the track, Zaheer falls to his left, but cannot stop it
stops in the delivery stride, bowls a length ball that turns in on leg, whipped down to long on
tosses this one up slowly, Ponting comes forward and turns it on the leg side, on to 99
drags it down as he sees him advancing, but Hussey adjusts, reaches out to lift it over wide long on
now he works away a single to bring Ricky on strike
Ricky Ponting has stood up in style to the big occasion, swats away one on leg stump for the single, raises his bat to all-round applause
the straighter one, but starting on leg stump, worked away down the ground
slogged away through midwicket, not short enough and he gets only a single
131 kph, stops a bit on the batsman from a length, who adjusts to guide it to point
right in the blockhole from Zaheer, cannot do much with those, dug out to the bowler
another one in the blockhole, super control from Zaheer, squeezed away to long on
comes down the track, cannot get hold of a short delivery, but still manages to get it down to fine leg
not quite in the blockhole, but full enough to stop the batsman from getting under it, worked away towards deep midwicket, and India leak the second run again
charges down the track, it is slower through the air, looks to go over midwicket, the ball rolls away back towards the bowler
goes for the big sweep, gets it off the inner edge backward of square leg
Ponting lines up for the reverse hit, a rarity, but ends up hitting it straight to Zaheer at short third man, end of a magnificent innings from the Australia captain, raises his bat as he walks back
stops in the delivery stride, bowls it slowly through the air, he pushes on the off side
and again, stops and bowls, swatted through midwicket, Johnson cannot launch in to those monster hits
very full, cramps him up as he tries to make room, dug out down the ground, end of Ashwin's spell, he has not done badly at all, at all
sees him come down the track, fires it in on leg stump, but it ends up far wide down the leg side, Dhoni had no chance
much better now, in the blockhole, he squeezes it out over the bowler
Johnson launches into the backfoot swat, but Ashwin at long on dives to his right and prevents the boundary, super stuff
Harbhajan in the blockhole, even Mitch cannot tee off from those lengths
gets it through midwicket, Yuvraj lost it in the setting sun, was late to get to the ball, gives them time to pick up two
was waiting for the reverse hit way for ages, but could not get the full toss past short third man
low full toss, David swats it over midwicket, by the time Raina gets around to it at wide long on, they have another couple to end on 260

inn2.comm: no four! Mini-victory for Lee. Sehwag stands back and punches a length ball to mid on.
hohho! 143 kph and late swing on a full ball on leg stump, Sehwag looks to flick and gets a leading edge down the track. Lee collects and lines up a throw. Sehwag hurries back into the crease
half an appeal as Lee looks to squeeze Sehwag down the leg side. Clips the thigh, but wrongly called a wide

Motera is a blur on my TV screen. 147 kph, length ball outside off. Sehwag stays exactly where he is and bludgeons on the up through the covers. Lee has a half smile. Watson in the slips looks flustered. Sehwag quietly taps the pitch. The crowd roars.
angles in from around middle and off, Sehwag plays back out to mid on
gets away with this one. Seemed like it deserved to be wided. 147 kph from Lee. Who says he is old! Short and wide, Sehwag looks to upper cut and misses.

Australia review a caught behind appeal that was turned down. Monster away seamer from Lee, he's doing Shane Warne at 145 kph. Lands on middle and off stump, short of a length, Sehwag looks to play back and is groping inside the line as the ball nips off. Did he edge it? He moved his back foot across to cover the line and the ball moved away so much, it missed the pad as well. Haddin collected and appealed. Replays don't suggest an edge. Watson and Hussey indicated as much. Ponting went for the review immediately. Lee's appeal was a little start-stop. Lots of replays. Nothing conclusive. They are taking their time over this one. Given not out in the end. Right decision, by the looks of it.

No first-ball four for Sehwag. Who cares. First ball four for the other guy, what's his name. Tait begins with a gentle 134 kph loosener outside off. Mistake. Lands back of a length and gives him width outside off. The little man stays put, gets half across, opens the face and convinces the ball to roll along to the point boundary. Class.
bad start. Tait wides down the leg side.

deja vu. The last time I saw Tendulkar do this in a World Cup was 2003. Centurion. Against one Shoaib Akhtar. Tait is just as fast. The ball is going just as fast. Short ball outside off. Sachin gets under it and upper cuts it almost all the way to the third man fence.
aha, Tait gets one back, slips a pacy short of length ball outside off. Sachin looks to cut and misses. Tait tells him what he thinks about it.
149 kph. The pace is up, but the direction is still a little awry. Very wide outside off and called.
Tait gets one on the spot, back of a length outside off and jumping up into Sachin's blade as he pushes off the front foot
this is a family site, so I won't say what Tait just told Tendulkar. The ball was fine though - hustling Sachin with a mean bouncer, Sachin just got under it and let it go.
ends with another wide and short ball, it was so wide Sachin could not middle the cut. He under-edges it to third man, and looks at the bat.
ahem, length ball on off stump, Sachin pushes into the covers and takes off. Sehwag takes around a year to make the single.
144 kph, and slanting into the pads, Sehwag tucks it away backward of the man at leg gully for a single
draws him out with a full delivery at 146 kph on off stump, Sachin leans into a drive but ends up playing it back down the track.
not in control this time. Lee gets this one to bounce extra as Sachin cuts and he plays uppishly  backward if point for a single. The top hand came off in an attempt to control that.
nice ball, well played. Short and aimed at Sehwag's ribs at 143 kph, he hangs back, rides the bounce and taps it to the leg side past the leg gully for a single
good searching delivery to end the over, 146.6 kph away seamer outside off, but Sachin shoulders arms
full length ball outside off, Sehwag doesn't really come forward as he drives powerfully to wide mid off
uh oh, Tait bowls a pretty good bouncer but he's over stepped. Sehwag ducked under this one. He won't duck under the next one.
can't believe I got that wrong! Sehwag ducks under the free hit. He backs away to the leg side, Tait follows him with a bouncer and Sehwag can't do anything.
Tait's direction is conspicuous by its absence. Another wide down the leg side.

whiplash. Tait sprays a length ball on the pads. Normal batsmen would have glanced this behind square, and Lee at fine leg would have kept it to a single. Sehwag, on the other hand, motors the wrists into action and keeps it in front of square. Lee has no chance.
back of a length, Sehwag plays from the crease and defends down the track
over-pitched on off stump at 147 kph. Too full for Sehwag to get under and time the drive, he plays it off the lower end of the bat into the covers
150.3 kph bumper to end the over. Sehwag hops back, rides the bounce and defends it with comfort rarely associated with Indian batsmen, to the off side
Lee has Sachin where he wants him - at the non-striker's end. Short ball, hustling into Sachin at 143 kph and he tucks it through the now vacant leg gully for one
another good ball, Sehwag plays a short ball at 137 kph off the back foot to midwicket and gets a single
fuller at 143 kph, looks to get Sachin driving and he punches with accomplishment straight to mid on

aha, interesting movements from Sachin. He seemed to be setting himself for the cut, late or square, but Lee did not give him that much width, though he was short at 138 kph. Sachin slaps it without timing to cover
full and straight at 149 kph, Sachin punches to mid off

width to end the over, Sachin's timing is ominous as he opens the face and steers backward of point. That speeds away almost for four, until Johnson comes in the way running in from third man and sliding.
ooh, whips in an inducker on middle at 138 kph and Sehwag looks to flick from the crease. Inside edge onto the pad.
good start from Mitch. The good Mitch has turned up, by the looks of it. 139 kph and no room to do anything. Sehwag politely pats to mid on from the crease.
I might have spoken too early. Mitch whangs a wide down the leg side
back of a length, Sehwag again hangs back and defends down the track
Sehwag cashes in on the first loose ball from Mitch. Length ball, curving in and ending on the pads, Sehwag whips through midwicket for three. Lee hares after it, slides and saves the fourth.
back of a length on off stump, Sachin gets half across and defends down the track again.
back of a length, wide outside off, Sachin lets it go to the keeper
length ball at 131 kph, the drop in pace is telling. Sehwag whips off the pads through midwicket for a single
short of a length just outside off, Sachin again gets across to off stump and defends
over-pitched on off stump, Sachin leans into a square drive and finds point. Good timing, but the placement wasn't there.

many a slip between cup and lip, but none standing next to Haddin. Watson's slow legcutter gets Sachin's outside edge as he drives away from the body. The ball goes agonisingly far enough from Haddin. No slips to take it.
full and angled into the pads, Sachin flicks straight to wide mid on
134 kph, back of a length outside off and cutting into Sachin who makes room and powers the back foot drive wide of point. They think of two today, but no luck.
short cover in business. Sachin doesn't get completely across into the cover drive, and plays it a touch uppishly to short cover.
full on off stump and angling across, Sachin gets the full face behind it and drives to mid off
oho, 144 kph length ball outside off, Sachin looks to steer and it stays low. He crouches in a hurry, but the ball whizzes through to the keeper, under the bat

pulled away. Emphatically. That's not been pulled, as much as yanked and shoved away. 146 kph bouncer, Sachin is so early into position that he plays it from middle and off line through the gap between midwicket and mid on.
fuller length on off stump, compact defence from Sachin towards mid off
over-pitched outside off at 144 kph and for once, Sachin mistimes a drive. Inside edged back down the track.

Sehwag is gone. He hasn't looked his best through this innings. Watson has got him with a bouncer that wasn't very high on pace, but was spot on with its direction. It angled in from outside off, cramping Sehwag for room as it came in, but he still looked to pull. The top edge ballooned up and landed in Hussey's hands at square leg, running back inside the circle. Huge wicket for Australia. I reckon, the huger one is at the other end though.
length ball outside off, Sachin looks to play back and steer, but can't get it away

Sachin's timed a cover drive so well that Lee from mid off gives up the chase. Slower ball, over-pitched outside off, Sachin gets the front foot gingerly into line and coaxes it through the covers. Narendra Modi, in the stands, (google for more info), applauds.
lets the next one go outside off, fuller length and Sachin shoulders arms.
Sachin pinches a single, tapping a length ball outside off with an angled face to point. Direct hit comes in, but they complete the single in time.

nervy start from Gambhir. Looks to leave a back of length ball outside off as he stays rooted on the crease. Late decision to leave, the ball hits the face of the bat before he can drag it away, but the shot doesn't carry to the keeper
whanged in on leg stump, short of a length and Sachin looks to whip around the corner. He can't get it away.
fuller and angling across at decent pace, Sachin gets onto the front foot and pushes into the covers
another front foot push from Sachin, he gets half forward to a length ball and plays sedately down the track
a feeler for the outside edge, 141 kph and dangled well wide, with a widish slip waiting. Sachin leaves, and is disappointed that it's not been wided.

fuller length well wide of off stump, Sachin goes down on a knee to play the square drive. Played into the turf, and an acrobatic stop by the man at short point. Bump ball. Doesn't fool too many people, but it fooled Ravi Shastri on air.
India have 50, nudging a length ball on middle and leg towards midwicket for a single
Watson keeps things tight. Full on off, Sachin drives firmly back down the track and Watson fields well on his follow through. Gambhir was backing up a long way.
back of a length on the pads, Sachin turns it away to the leg side quietly
over-pitched on the pads at 129 kph, Sachin tickles it away off the toes through square leg for a couple more.
another outside edge. Watson sends in a dobbler that nips away at 126 kph, and Sachin looks to open the face and steer. The legcutter takes the outside edge, but lands well short of slip.
Sachin hangs back on the crease to a back of a length ball outside off and guides in front of point for a single
Watson sprays one well down the leg side and it is called a wide

What's this going to be? Ponting takes a low dipping catch diving forward from square leg. Is it a bump ball? He says he doesn't know. It is being referred. Short ball, aimed at Gambhir's ribs but not much pace on it. Gambhir can't keep the nudge to the leg side down. It pops up, Ponting comes forward and dives forward. Oh, that's clearly bounced. Good old one-pitch catch. In gully cricket, Gambhir would have been out. Ponting might not have known, he was diving full length forward with the hands well in front.
Sachin plays the shot of the evening. Length ball on middle and angling across Sachin, who walks into position and whips it on the trot through midwicket.

Sachin is bettering himself. He again makes the pace and room as Johnson keeps one on a length just outside off. Sachin steers it with the dexterity you would associate with Michael Shumacher in Monaco. Top shot, beats point. Beats third man.
fuller and on middle stump, Sachin defends from the crease, cautiously
not a very good ball, short and angling into the pads, Sachin nurdles it off the pads through backward square leg. Lee runs back from the circle to cut off the boundary.
fuller length outside off, Sachin lets it go

ominous timing from Sachin. Length ball outside off, Sachin moves the front foot into position and brings the bat down in the smoothest of arcs, bisecting the covers. Good thing for Australia there was protection in the deep
over-pitched on off, Sachin times the straight drive well and Watson does well to field on his follow through
bouncer outside off, Sachin seemed to know it a year in advance, moving across to off stump and hanging back in the crease. He rolls his wrists and plays the pull down to deep midwicket
Gambhir looks to drive from the crease to a length ball and ends up getting a nervy inside edge past the leg stump.
ooh, nice offcutter from Watson comes in sharply as Sachin looks to push the front pad outside the line. He is rapped on the move, but outside the line. Not given. Not referred.
offcutter coming in from outside off, Sachin belatedly looks to whip through mid on, but finds the fielder
Watson is bowling some canny stuff here, another buzzing offcutter than gives Sachin the illusion of room before curving in, and he inside edges the on-the-knee steer onto the pads.
and right away beats Gautam with a 147.7 kph length ball from round the stumps that Gautam decides to have a poke at
gets forward and tries to drive a fuller delivery, but cannot time it
decides to have a go at a fuller delivery that shapes away late and is beaten again, was in no position for the drive, lucky  he did not get an edge
Lee gives him the shorter one, and he stands beside the line to guide it past the slips
and there is the 18,000th run to loud cheers, he gets out to a length ball and pushes it to sweeper cover, 18,000, ridiculously massive
gets one where he likes it, fullish on the pads and right away flicks it in front of square
Gautam charges down the track for that lofted shot over extra cover, and gets it off the middle of the blade, loud crack as it flies over the off side infield
now he gets in to a tangle as he looks to work away a fullish delivery, rolls away down the track
gets it to cut away from leg stump, and Gautam defends calmly off the back foot
pushes a fuller one towards mid off, and rushes for the single, looked very tight initially, but he managed it comfortably in the end
guided to third man off the back foot, that was wide outside off stump
Gautam is living on the edge literally, fortunately he is not nicking these deliveries that are beating him outside off stump, another one is angled across and he decided to have a loose waft
157.1 kph short ball, Sachin is caught in two minds, decides to weave away first, then tries to send it over the keeper with a late dab, but misses, Lee smiles
whipped away off the pads to fine leg, easily done
Gambhir is looking very edgy, nervy, tentative, pushes at one that goes off the edge perilously close to the stumps, bounces past them in the end
now he bangs one in from round the wicket, and Gambhir lets it go down the leg side
punches at a length ball outside off and gets it down to third man
full toss outside off stump, Sachin punches to mid off

Sachin survives, how did he manage that, he backed away initially before deciding to late cut in the air, the ball looped slowly to Krejza at third man, he looked to have it covered, maybe was a bit slow in coming forward, maybe lost it in the lights, dropped just short of him
and right away slings this one down the leg side
gets to the half-century with a delicious flick off the pads, deep square leg comes charging to his right and saves the boundary, picks up the ball and relays it to fine leg who throws the ball in
140.2 kph ball that stops on Sachin, he is sucked in to the drive, bat turns in his hands, and the ball rolls to mid off
this time he is neatly behind the line of a length ball, loud defensive crack of the bat
148.5 kph Tait is looking to fire them in full and on the stumps, he gets behind the line again and pushes down the track
how is he reading these short deliveries, he was into position right away, it was banged in, and he unfurled the smoothest of pulls, down to deep square leg, got right outside the line as he did that
Haddin goes full stretch to his right to take a 148.4 kph screamer that Tait had bowled down the leg side
gets some width outside off stump and flashes the full-blooded cut, too bad he gets only a single to third man for that
and right away Gautam is down the track and lofts him inside out towards sweeper cover
short ball, turning in, pulled away to deep midwicket
more turn, but outside off, going further away, cut to sweeper cover
one more short ball to Sachin, he swivels, twirls the bat as he launches in to the pull to deep midiwicket
this time he is not getting away with the short ball, Gambhir is quick to latch on to the pull and dismiss it through midwicket
better, fuller and played out on the off side

Sachin is gone, or is he, is that a back foot no-ball, it was a length ball outside off stump, and he nibbled it on its way to Haddin, it was very close to being a no-ball, but Tait got away with it, he hadn't grounded the back heel on the line, Sachin has to walk back
right forward in defence to the length ball outside off
this one zooms in for Kohli's throat, he has to hurry out of harm;s way, got in to some tangle but managed to back away in the end
gets off the mark with a flick to fine leg off the pads
lets one go outside off stump, Tait has overstepped this time, free hit coming up
backs away, and goes for the cut to a shortish one, but not much power in the shot, and gets it down to third man on the bounce
another one on the pads at 148.7 kph, Kohli shuffles and whips it away to Mitch at fine leg
Krejza is yet to find the proper length on this track, another shortish one is whipped away through midwicket
almost gets him, looks to work a fuller one against the turn, and the leading edge goes in the air, but between cover and point
worked away in front of midwicket, cannot get the single
turning on leg stump, whipped away to fine leg
skips down the track, he bowls it a little wider, but gautam adjusts to push it to sweeper cover
big turn and bounce for Krejza, Kohli wanted to whip it away on the leg side, but got it off the inside edge on to pad, Haddin was late in getting around to try and take it, Krejza was all excited
these two are sharp between the wickets, and pinch a quick one to mid on
cuts in from some way outside off stump, left alone
targets him with the 148.4 kph bouncer, Kohli gets outside the line and fends it away backward of square leg, tackled it well
152.7 kph fuller one slung in on the stumps, from round the wicket, he flicks it wide of midwicket
whips a back of a length ball wide of mid on and the single is on
places the cut deftly wide of third man and past point to pick up a couple
turns in to Kohli who makes room outside leg and works it backward of square
tossed up outside off, but still not full enough, he backs away and cuts to sweeper cover
gets well forward and works a fuller one with the turn to midwicket
has him go for the whiplash drive to a flighted one outside off stump, off the inner half down the track
and again, Kohli is going for his trademark cover drive against the turn, cannot beat the infield though
a touch short again, turns towards the leg side and he goes back to work it behind square
punched off the back foot, Ponting lets it slip through his fingers at extra cover
slowly bowled, turning in on leg stump, calmly nudged to short fine leg
flatter and pushed out in to the off side
goes reaching out at one that turns from outside off and gets an edge in the air but no damage done
fuller one and he eases it down to long on
Gautam gets the single this time, working it away to deep square leg
oops, what was that, flighted on leg stump, Gautam looked to push with the turn, but this one jagged away sharply to leave him in a mess, and just missed off stump
this time gets the single down the ground
he is looking to constantly drive the fuller one, mistimes it again
almost holes out to deep midwicket, launches in to the big pull but it falls short
he skips down the track, and the ball almost sneaks past, just got the bat down in time
shouts from the fielders as Gautam drives inside out in the air to sweeper cover
turned in to the leg side off the front foot
down the track, to the pitch, and pushes for the single to long on
Kohli with that whiplash of a drive, gets it off the middle and it screams away to sweeper cover
worked in to the leg side for another run
now he works it away through square leg
that's the way to go about it, yet another single, down the ground to long on, calmly done
down the track, takes it on the full, and hits it through midwicket, but not enough power to beat the man running in from deep midwicket
trying to get the big turn from leg stump, too full again and worked away for a single on the leg side
this time Kohli gets the single, no risk at all
leaves the crease and drives inside out with the turn wide of long off to pick up a couple
some tangle he gets in to now, this one pitches on leg and straightens to strike him high on the pad
Gautam is looking very eager to take toll of every ball, almost yorks himself as he charges to meet this fuller delivery, ball rolls away on the off side
swats a shortish one down to long on off the back foot
fuller now, and worked towards square leg, there is no one there, midwicket charges to field
goes for a forcing shot, but mistimes it to the bowler
fuller this time, and he bashes it in the air, Gambhir ducks underneath the missile as it flies at him, goes towards long on
some turn for David, bounce too, played uncertainly on the off side
played out on the off side, this time there is no single
loopy full toss, Kohli misses out, slaps it away right to sweeper cover
angles across the left-hander, tapped away late towards point, deft
finally Kohli gets some reward for those meaty whiplash drives, drives with the turn past extra cover, no chance for sweeper cover
bowler and keeper interested as they think there might be some pad, this one was guided fine on the off side
worked in front of square leg
whipped away off the back foot in front of square leg
defended off the front foot calmly
guided towards point, they take on the fielder and get the single easily

Kohli has thrown it away totally against the run of play, full toss on the stumps, he threw his bat wildly at it, but only found the man at midwicket, David cannot believe it, he is smiling wildly, Virat is disappointed but he has to go
another full toss! Another heave over the leg side, but Yuvraj gets well under it and slams it over midwicket. Just. He's away with a boundary.
faster ball, fired in at 97 kph outside off, Yuvraj just lets it go
Hussey slips in the armer, Yuvraj misses as he plays for the turn and is struck, but that might have been sliding down the leg side
Gambhir shimmies down the track, gets to the pitch of an offie on off stump and powers it through extra cover for a couple. He's looking good against spin.
short of a length on the pads, Gambhir stays back and taps to square leg. 150 up.

Yuvraj has played this paddle sweep well in this World Cup. It's not a shot he played much previously, but boy he's hitting them alright. Krejza drops this well outside leg, the bat comes over it from cover and swipes it easily through to fine leg
fired in fast and full, Yuvraj misses the whip and gets a leg bye to the leg side
Gambhir jumps out again, real early, Krejza sees him and holds it back and gets it to grip and turn away. Gambhir is left stranded mid-pitch, groping for it, but manages to stab it away.
again he trots out, but this time it is very full on the pads and he heaves to the leg side for one
Hussey tosses it up on the pads, Gambhir gets inside the line and nudges to square leg
tossed up outside off, Yuvraj seems to mean business, huge follow through as he check drives to long off for one
Gambhir is fidgetting all around the crease, this time he backs away and looks for the cut, but ends up defending as Hussey fires it in straight.
down the track, gets to the pitch and cover drives well, but can't beat the infield
pushes a length ball to mid off, Yuvraj wants one, but Gambhir doesn't
plays back to another sharp armer that comes in, and Gambhir manages to stab away through backward point for one
Yuvraj is looking good, camps on the back foot for Krejza's offie to come on around off stump and then whips easily through midwicket
on the back foot again, punched with the spin through mid off for one.
uppish but safely so. Tossed up outside off, Gambhir looks to play the inside out carve over point and gets it out to the outfield.

heart in mouth moment for Yuvraj. Sweeps a delivery from outside off, against the turn, with a man in the deep and gets a top edge that hangs in the air for ever. When it comes down behind square leg, it lands in vacant real estate
Gambhir does his sashay down the pitch and pick up with the spin again, more control this time as he spoons it to deep extra cover for two more.
single to end the over as Gambhir waits for a back of length ball on off stump and guides again through point

50 for Gambhir, his third in the World Cup. And he's apparently not in form, according to some. Full length ball outside off, seemed to be going away as Gambhir covered the line and opened the face to steer through point
through Yuvraj. Oohs and aahs from the crowd. He neither gets forward nor stays back and pokes at a length ball that comes in with the angle from amidships. Misses the inside edge and the stumps.
tight line from Mitch, no reverse yet. Holds its line from short of a length and Yuvraj defends to point from the crease

oh boy, Gambhir escapes. Ponting misses the stumps. Full on the toes, Yuvraj times the flick really well and Gambhir took off, but Yuvraj had hit it straight to Ponting at midwicket. He lines up a throw and lets fly. Gambhir had given up. Miss and he survives.
short ball, cramping Yuvraj for room and tucking him up, he does well to jump and nudge to the leg side for one
similar ball to Gambhir, who also leaps onto the backfoot to leap and drop it down

this is horrendous running. Complete communication breakdown, says Sanjay Manjrekar. Arm ball on the stumps, Yuvraj plays all around it and it pops away to the leg side. Gambhir starts and stops. Yuvraj starts and stops. The throw goes to the batter's end. Should have gone to the other end.

infantile running. Gambhir is gone. That was even more horrendous. Not sure what was happening there again. Yuvraj guides a ball outside off backward of square, very fine on the off side. The ball went nowhere, and first slip was after it. Gambhir wants a single and runs three-fourths of the way down the track. Yuvraj hasn't budged. Not sure what Gambhir was thinking. He turned and then gave up, he didn't have a chance anyway. Gambhir just looks miffed with Yuvraj, as he bad-mouths on the way back. The fault was entirely his.

this match is alive. India are stuttering for no reason. Yuvraj is early into a chip into the off side and it is nearly played right back at Hussey who puts the right arm out on his follow through. Too far away though.
Dhoni leans out to a delivery breaking in from outside off and gets a single
Yuvraj nudges a full ball to midwicket, lots of chatter even before they get a single to a vacabt midwicket area.
top delivery from Mitch, bouncer that curls away in the air after landing. Yuvraj looks out of his range as he weaves on the back foot as it goes away.
fuller delivery on off, Yuvraj gingerly gets onto the front foot and pushes to mid off.
over-pitched and slanted onto the pads, Yuvraj looks to whip and it runs away backward of square leg for one. Off the pads.
full delivery outside off, Dhoni gets the foot half across and drops into the covers for a single
Mitch is making Yuvraj look ordinary. He lands one back of a length on the seam and gets it to jar away as Yuvraj gropes inside the line.
Yuvraj goes fishing outside off again, and misses. Looked to steer to third man, and just as well for him that he didn't get bat on it.

Dhoni's got a boundary to release some of the pressure. Poor delivery from Hussey, lands it midway and it turns in a little, but there was enough room for Dhoni to whack the cut through the covers. Ponting makes a huge effort in the infield and injures his already dodgy little finger. Deep point runs across and makes an extraordinary effort, but it is four.
tossed up outside off, Dhoni powers the cover drive away for one more
back of a length on off and middle, Yuvraj defends from the crease
full toss on off stump, Yuvraj misses out, completely mistiming the cover drive and he gets it out to point
Hussey escapes with a poor ball, short and going down the leg side, Yuvraj looks to paddle-pull to fine leg, but Ponting at short fine leg is on it. Today, Ponting has been everywhere!
again it is Ponting, this time at cover. Dhoni pushes a full delivery on off to his right, but the Aussie captain slides and slips away to deny him the single
imprint lbw delivery, full and tailing into the pads, but Yuvraj manages to get the bat down at the last moment and flick to deep square leg. Lee cleans up as they get a second.
short ball, Yuvraj is readily on the back foot and hops back to the 143 kph bumper to drop it to the leg side
there are no fish in the Kankaria lake in Ahmedabad, but Yuvraj is really fishing hard. Another lazy flail at a back of length ball outside off, swish and a miss.

and you wonder why he does that fishing thing, when he can play shots like these. 143 kph delivery angling into the pads, Yuvraj gets the front foot into line and thumps it through the line, between the bowler and mid on. Right out of the screws, as they say.
another good shot as Mitch again searches for the lbw, with one angling into the pads, Yuvraj whips it backward of square and Lee puts in a huge effort at deep backward square leg to save four.
ooh, Mitch gets one to nip in a touch as Yuvraj pushes outside the line and looks to defend. Bat first? Pad first? No appeal.

India are running like a dodgy tummy that's eaten more spices that it should have. Sharp inducking bouncer at Dhoni who hops back and defends off the inside edge to the leg side. Yuvraj wants a single now. What's this affliction for running non-existent singles? Gets back just in time.
reverse swing. Horror shot. Dhoni survives. Lee gets a full delivery at 143 kph to curl in, Dhoni has a huge swing at it and misses. It goes in through the bat and pad gap to the keeper.

Dhoni has perished. He's not been in great form, and clearly that's affecting his thinking. After the last two balls, you'd have expected better than a wild airy cut to a short ball. That was again pacy from Lee, got it to bounce extra and Dhoni had no control on the cut. Seemed like he wanted to hit it right through Clarke at point. Pup keeps his cool and holds a blinder as the ball buzzes away to his right. India are throwing this away.
firmly planted on the back foot as he's expecting a bouncer, but Lee delivers this full and wide outside off. Raina pushes it without much assurance to the off side
short ball from round the wicket, ends up outside off as Raina hangs back and taps towards point. Dot ball. Required rate is over six, for the first time tonight.
fantastic stuff from Lee. Wicket-maiden on his return to the attack. Length ball angling in from outside off, Raina stays in the crease and plays into the covers
short ball aimed at the body, Yuvraj hops back and whips through square leg for one. Could have been two. Poor running.
Raina plays his own brand of the controlled pull. He's sitting back and plays it in ginger fashion to deep square leg for one
another short ball, Yuvraj jumps up and back in the crease and defends to the off side
late swing, full at 151 kph and curving away from middle and leg towards off. Yuvraj squeezes it off the outside half of the bat to point
still can't get the single. Tait keeps it short from round the wicket, Yuvraj looks to steer backward of point but finds the fielder

Yuvraj's hit a stunning boundary here. Somewhat risky and in the air, but he seemed to know what he was doing. Tait gives him just enough width outside off to get under and crack it over point. It nearly carries all the way, a couple of metres inside the ropes.

that's as assured as you will ever see Raina playing a short ball. He camps back in the crease, waiting for the ball that's coming at the ribs, but this one from Lee doesn't lift so much. Raina has it in his range and rolls the wrists over the pull and through to midwicket for four more.
the crowd finds some energy again, Raina drops a length ball into the covers and gets a single to cover. For a change, some good running.
Lee slips one too far wide outside off.
aha, swing and a miss. Oohs and aahs! Yuvraj sets up a strong base on leg stump line and looks to go up and over the off side. The ball whizzes past, short of a length.

top shot from Yuvraj. India are turning it back to an even keel. How did he get that away? That was a stunning yorker from Lee. Coming in from wide of the crease and ending on off stump, at the toes. Yuvraj calmly comes down on it, and opens the face to send it scurrying fine of third man. How?!
aha, back of a length, Yuvraj pushes to cover. Raina wants one, is sent back and dives in before the throw comes in.

sensational counter-punch this from Yuvraj. He knows momentum is everything in this chase now. Short of a length ball outside off, Yuvraj is on the front foot as he walks into a murderous carve over cover point.
Raina does the sane thing. Short ball angling across, he hops back and guides backward of point for a single

overthrows now. It's all happening. Yuvraj calmly taps a length ball to the off side and they run a single. The throw is horrendous. Haddin doesn't collect. They get a second. Ponting thinks they should not have run, since Raina was in Haddin's way. Doesn't seem to really have a case.
Tait's gifted five more and an extra ball. He's slanted this a mile outside off. Haddin can't collect.
slower ball at 127 kph. Yuvraj spots it and taps to cover point for a single.

Raina's pull again. He's pulled Lee. He's now pulled Tait. On this pitch, the short ball is not a worry. He manages to swivel around and keep it down to deep midwicket as it comes towards the waist. 25 have come off the last 10 balls.

the pressure is showing on everyone! Raina looks to heave a cover drive to a ball well outside off, without getting across. Inside edge misses the stumps, Haddin comes across to stop it, Raina wanders out and hurries back in. Tait tells him what he thinks of it.

scorcher of a yorker, but he's ended up sliding it onto the pads. Raina skips inside the line and flicks neatly to the deep. Australia are not fielding at their best now. Horror throw comes in mid-pitch and they get a second easily.
tossed up outside off, driven carefully to cover. A rare dot ball.
smart play from Yuvraj. Short of a length on middle and leg, he taps it to the vacant midwicket region for one
is that Krejza or Murali? Curls in with the arm, lands outside off and then breaks away sharply as Raina feels for it. Hmm.
leading edge now. Krejza again gets big spin from leg stump line and Raina looks to work it to the leg side. Plays it back to the bowler.
fuller on middle and off, Raina is stout in defence, reaching out and smothering it this time.,
Krejza drops short, he has done that off and on today. Raina waits and forces him off the back foot through the covers for a single
back of a length on the leg stump, worked to the leg side for a single
short ball on the pads, Yuvraj quietly tucks it to midwicket for a single
Raina shuffles across like a card dealer in Las Vegas would. Gets prone on middle stump but works it in front of square leg for one
hmm, straight and slowish, Yuvraj is early on the forcing shot through on side and just keeps it down.

you have to feel for Lee. He's made a monumental effort at fine leg, but it is still four. Short ball on leg stump, Yuvraj gets inside the line and plays down on it, the pull hurries down to fine leg. Lee runs a mile to his left and then dives full length. He gets a hand on the ball, but the ball bounces up and hits him in the eye. The man doesn't even flinch. He watches in agony as the ball rolls away from him, and inevitably to the boundary. Lee is up, he has blood gushing out of a cut to the right of his right eye. What a player. He's away for some repair work now.
back of a length on off stump, Yuvraj plays it calmly into the covers
tossed up and turning away from outside off, Raina lunges to the flight of the ball and dabs it into the covers for one
on Yuvraj's pads, he dinks another easy single to square leg
can someone teach Krejza the lbw law please? Short ball lands on leg, doesn't turn is going too high, well over the tenth stump if there were one. Raina looks to heave and misses. Krejza appeals.
fuller outside off, Raina taps into the covers for another single
huge spin, lands on leg and more than straightens. Yuvraj is almost opened up as he turns the bat too early.
short but no turn, hurries along as Yuvraj looks to cut. Bottom edged onto the turf.
length ball from Watson on the leg stump, Raina looks to muscle it over deep square leg, but doesn't time it so well. Just as well, on the bounce to the man in the deep.

Yuvraj runs in like a fiend. Defends a length ball to David Hussey and mid off, runs like a man possessed and dives like Ian Thorpe, full on and into the crease. Would have made his ground if it had hit. It didn't
another bouncer at Raina, he somehow manages to redirect it to midwicket for a single

Fifty to Yuvraj. Each run has come under immense pressure.  Fourth fifty of the World Cup. Length ball on the pads, Yuvraj is inside the line and hops onto the back foot as he nudges to deep backward square leg for a couple.
he's doing it easily at the moment. This is top-notch one-day batting on display. Length ball angling across him, Yuvraj opens the face of the bat as he dabs to third man for one more
Raina gets one more, stays on the back foot but whips in front of square easily for a single.

Raina has smeared him over long on. Lee lands one on the length, in Raina's business area. Mid on is inside the circle. Raina needs no more incentive to go over the top, he gets the front foot into line and mows it a long way. Huge moment.
back of a length and coming into the pads, Raina dabs through square leg for a single
bouncer at 146.9 kph, he does his best to hustle Yuvraj into the corner, but Yuvraj leaps back in the crease and defends towards point. He had that under complete control.
another short ball, at 143 kph and targetted at the body. Yuvraj stays put on the crease and defends down the track

Lee has not given up. He sends down a skidding yorker, and Yuvraj plays forward to it and ends up meeting it on the full. Just as well, the outside edge takes it away from the stumps and then it thuds into the turf on the way to Haddin.
back of a length to end the over, Yuvraj is completely focused - no pressure on him despite playing four successive dot balls. He works it to the leg side of the pitch and stays put in the crease.

India are running home in a hurry. Johnson sends a bouncer down, but misses the line by a fraction. That's exactly what Raina is playing for when he hops inside the line to a bouncer. This one ends up to the right of his body and he glances it along, using Mitch's pace, and it screams away to fine leg.
short and fast outside off, Raina has things under control now. He opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third man for a single
slanting into the pads, Yuvraj gets some pad on it as he looks to flick. Leg bye. India get closer.
Raina backs away a touch, but Mitch follows him and Raina steers a short ball to deep backward point for a single
the crowd is delirious. Mitch slants another wide down the leg side. Ponting looks gutted. India are taking this away.
slow and back of a length outside off, Yuvraj looks to guide backward of point and he gets an inside edge onto the pads for a single into the off side.

another Raina dink through the leg side. Mitch drops a short ball on the pads and Raina will keep tucking them there all day if he has to. There are no fielders there. Easy couple to India. The parties have started in the stands, says Ravi Shastri.
Lee is still not giving up. Yorker at 139 kph on off stump, Yuvraj looks to deflect it to third man but finds point
another yorker on middle and leg, Yuvraj can't get anything under it as he drives straight to mid off
another yorker, marginally off-line, ends up on the toes and Yuvraj could have flicked through backward square leg  but couldn't get it away.

a poetic moment for the Indian fans. Australia's reign has ended. The crowd has lost it. Yuvraj is on the turf, mid-pitch, arms aloft, looking up at the sky and then waving his bat away in a frenzy of emotions. And just as well. We will have new World Champions, for the first time since 1999. Length ball on off stump, Yuvraj wanted to do it at one go, he backed away marginally and caned it through the covers. Everything is a blur. Australia are out. India will play Pakistan in Mohali.
